thread.section_title: Dresslink 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Dresslink 的点评意见 | dresslink.com
thread.title: Casey

author: Casey
title: Casey
text: I ordered a hoodie on March 3rd and it is now the 30th. There is no shipping information on it and no customer service number to call. I think this place is a scam. I want my hoodie or A FULL refund. This company is horrible dont get ripped off like I did. ROSEWE is also a scam site. China based company ripping tons of people off everday. I hope both companies get a class action lawsuit against them for there actions.
